title: U-Net Model with submission
description: OverviewWe try here to improve another public U-Net model: https://www.kaggle.com/kmader/baseline-u-net-model-part-1 which shows how to extract the segmentation map for the ships, augment the images and train a simple DNN model to detect them. A few additional tweaks like balancing the ship-count out a little better have also been done. We are using a different loss function (closer to the competition scoring) and also fix and improve some visualisation functions and the submission itself.
